articles.title: NASA's Mars Helicopter Survives First Cold Martian Night on Its Own - NASA Mars Exploration
articles.description: NASA’s Ingenuity helicopter can be seen on Mars as viewed by the Perseverance rover’s rear Hazard Camera on April 4, 2021, the 44th Martian day, or sol of the mission.
articles.content:
Making it through the frigid Martian temperatures after being deployed by NASA’s Perseverance rover is a major milestone for the small rotorcraft.
